text: Sissal Jóhanna Norðberg Niclasen (born 13 February 1995), known as Sissal, is a Faroese singer. She represented Denmark at the Eurovision Song Contest 2025 with the song "Hallucination", where she finished in 23rd place with 47 points. ==Biography== Sissal was born on 13 February 1995 in Tórshavn, the capital city of the Faroe Islands, an autonomous territory of the Denmark. In 2020, she moved to Copenhagen, Denmark to launch her music career. ==Discography== ===Extended plays=== Title Details Hear Me Now * Released: 10 January 2025 * Label: Pussy Records * Formats: Digital download, streaming ===Singles=== Title Year Peak chart positions Album DEN Air.
